name: Quantum Gateway Web Form for eShop
author: mthosting

sections.description:
This plugin adds Quantum Gateway webform support to eShop. During checkout customer is redirected to Quantum Gateway’s secure checkout form. It reduces your PCI compliance requirements.

Quantum Gateway is a true merchant account.

This plugin was created and is supported by www.mthosting.net.

Support

This plugin has unofficial support from www.mthosting.net. Customers and our Merchants have priority support.

Other

If would like to signup for Quantum Gateway: Sign-Up. An active account is required to use this plugin
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload eshop-quantumwebform directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin in eShop.
sections.faq:
Do I need a an account to use this plugin?

Yes, you need a Quantum Gateway Account Sign-Up.
